helpers module¶

helpers.anker(poly, keyword='lower_left')¶

keywords = ‘lower_left’,’upper_left’,’lower_right’,’upper_right’,’center’ returns: array([x,y])

helpers.empty()¶
helpers.find_vertex(keyword, x, y, average=False)¶

keywords: ‘left’,’right’,’top’,’bottom’ x, y: coordinates of the polygon returns: the arguments (average=False) or the average argument (average=True) of the polygon indices

helpers.flattenMultipoly(arr)¶

Shapely multipolygon >> list of polygons

helpers.flattenMultipolyG(arr)¶

Shapely multipolygon >> list of polygons

helpers.invert_polarity(BoundingBox, Polygons)¶

G: GROUNDPLANE

code:

BoundingBox = SD.mybox((0,0),chipwidth,chipheight)
Polygons = G.get_polygons() or G.get_groundpolys() + G.get_strucpolys()
